name: gnome-download-notify
title: Gnome Download Notifications
description: Gnome notification integration for downloads. Requires notify-send
author: ion201

preferences.name: icon_path
preferences.title: Icon path
preferences.description: Path to icon to use in notification. Leave blank to use the default firefox icon

preferences.name: notify_timeout
preferences.title: Notification timeout
preferences.description: Does not work on all systems

preferences.name: is_transient
preferences.title: Transient notifications
preferences.description: do not leave notifications in system tray
